title: The Red Odyssey 1.3M (Official Mission Pack for Battlezone)
description:
The Red Odyssey 1.3M 

Size 42,0 MB, it includes stock game plus: 

- 1.3 patch - latest official patch 
- win 95/98/Me or win 2000/XP/Vista installation option 
- dial-up or broadband installation option 
- 1.4 server session patch - for being able to play RO in the Bz lobby 
- odyssey.iso - if you don&#039;t have CD 
- option for not installing annoying green RO cursor which remains after exiting game 
- fixed description files 

Note: 
It requires original Battlezone or Battlezone 1.4M (http://thepiratebay.se/tor/4155384) to be preinstalled in C:\Program Files\Activision\Battlezone. 
Image file is in folder EXTRAS. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

More info on Battlezone 1 Forum - http://battlezone1.freeforums.org
